article.Heading: GST: 4th GoM-GSTN meeting underway
article.Summary: The 4th meeting of the group of ministers (GoM) looking into its related issues of the goods and services tax (GST) is currently underway in Bengaluru. The GoM could also be giving additional tasks to Infosys to be looked into in the GST network.
article.Body:
The 4th meeting of the group of ministers (GoM) looking into its related issues of the goods and services tax (GST) is currently underway in Bengaluru. The GoM could also be giving additional tasks to Infosys to be looked into in the GST network.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Rukmini Rao for more details.
